feed.title: André Paul Grandsire
feed.subtitle: "I'm a passionate developer. This site was build to provide a" " simple business card and a simple blog application"

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
This is my first blog post. I'm trying to build a simple Business Card. Try Jekyll could be easier than WordPress for our purpose.
So, with this simple post, as many developers, we build a `Hello World` post.
That's all, folks! I don't know what I'll write here, but will continue to use this blog as a way to learn and develop better tools and layouts.
entry.summary: This is my first blog post. I’m trying to build a simple Business Card. Try Jekyll could be easier than WordPress for our purpose.
